post_content:
Hey guys, just a quick update on my T206 Binder Build 

I just reached the 1 year anniversary for my T206 journey.
Last year I purchase both Tom Downey cards which fostered my love for this set.  

I decided on a Binder Set to keep my costs down , but have cracked some slabs along the way.

I am currently 382/520.

But more importantly, I am 44/48 on my Souther League sub-set.  I need the following cards. Raw or graded 1s/2s preferred.

Molesworth, Carlton
Shaughnessy, Shag
Ryan, Ray
Violat, Juan


Hit me up with some pics.  Cell is in signature.

Thanks
Congrats on the progress Billy, and good luck on the final four, it’s a fun subset to complete, Cheers! Colton

That’s really impressive, Billy.
I think you bought in at a good time; it’s a buyer’s market.
Do you think you’ll get to 500 in your second year?

Good luck!

Doug

You know what they say, "the first 382 are the easiest..."



[quote name="dougscats" post=2421733]That’s really impressive, Billy.
I think you bought in at a good time; it’s a buyer’s market.
Do you think you’ll get to 500 in your second year?

Good luck!

Doug[/QUOTE]
